name: CyberSouls - GAME JAM GAME
description:
ONLY SUPPORTS XBOX CONTROLLER

Made in Unreal Engine 5.

Hotline Miami meets cyberpunk in this fast paced office building isometric hack and slash shooter.

Take the souls of your enemy before the company reduces them to dust and upgrade yourself to withstand this toxic work environment.

GAME JAM GAME - I worked on the upgrade system, where when you go up to a vending machine and interact with it 3 random upgrades from an upgrade struct appear. When purchased they are removed from an array so when the next vending machine is interacted with it can't display the same upgrades.

I also made it so that the UI and menus could be navigated with a controller.

Everything else was developed by the rest of the team:

Calum Short -Team Lead / Tech Designer (https://www.calumshort.com/),  Kaitlyn Taylor - Tech Designer (https://www.kaitlyntaylorgamedesign.com/), Alex Diamond - Tech Designer/ Level Design / UI Design, Rahamahn Ali - Programmer / AI, Harley Payne - Programmer / AI , Jack Spencer - Character Artist / Animator (https://jack_spencer.artstation.com/),  Alicia Amaral - Character Artist / Animator /Texture Artist, Bradley Curtis - Environment Art / UI Artist (https://bradleycurtis.artstation.com/).
